data.description:
ClassicGames: REPLAY EVERYTHING.

A place to hang out and discuss classic video games of all platforms. From Diablo to Super Mario Bros. (and everything in between), classic games are close to our hearts.

LFG, memes, shit posting, circle jerking, are all accepted. 

Let's have some fun and keep the love of these classic games alive!

Please label posts with the following:

[LFG]
[Shit Post]
[Circle Jerk]
[Meme]
[**** Sale]
[General]

For example: [LFG] Who wants to play Starcraft?
[Steam Sale] Earthworm Jim Collection
data.description_html:
ClassicGames: REPLAY EVERYTHING.

A place to hang out and discuss classic video games of all platforms. From Diablo to Super Mario Bros. (and everything in between), classic games are close to our hearts.

LFG, memes, shit posting, circle jerking, are all accepted.

Let's have some fun and keep the love of these classic games alive!

Please label posts with the following:

[LFG] [Shit Post] [Circle Jerk] [Meme] [**** Sale] [General]

For example: [LFG] Who wants to play Starcraft? [Steam Sale] Earthworm Jim Collection
data.name: ClassicGames

data.description: A command center for men intent on improving themselves in every aspect of life: physically, intellectually, spiritually, and otherwise. data.description:
A place for all anime art of the fantasy persuasion.

# Rules:

1.All content must be in anime style and relate to some form of fantasy. Sci-fi is of course welcome.

2.Anything NSFW must be tagged appropriately.

3.Lewd art is allowed as long as it's tagged NSFW, hardcore works however are not and best taken to one of the hentai guilds.

4.Posts must credit the artist and link to their social media.

5.Posts that are excessively grotesque or sexual are not allowed.

# Our Friends

+ArtofFantasy - Our sibling guild for fantasy art of the western persuasion

+GirlsFrontline - A guild dedicated to the sci-fi mobile game 'Girl's Frontline' in which art, news and videos are posted.

+Anime - A space to discuss and share anime run by our friend @FaustAlexander

+Manga A space to Discuss and Share Manga run by our friend @FaustAlexander
data.description_html:
A place for all anime art of the fantasy persuasion.

Rules:

1.All content must be in anime style and relate to some form of fantasy. Sci-fi is of course welcome.

2.Anything NSFW must be tagged appropriately.

3.Lewd art is allowed as long as it's tagged NSFW, hardcore works however are not and best taken to one of the hentai guilds.

4.Posts must credit the artist and link to their social media.

5.Posts that are excessively grotesque or sexual are not allowed.

Our Friends

+ArtofFantasy - Our sibling guild for fantasy art of the western persuasion

+GirlsFrontline - A guild dedicated to the sci-fi mobile game 'Girl's Frontline' in which art, news and videos are posted.

+Anime - A space to discuss and share anime run by our friend @FaustAlexander

+Manga A space to Discuss and Share Manga run by our friend @FaustAlexander
data.name: AnimeFantasy

data.description: A guild to get real news about China without political bashing nor propaganda. Our sources will be expats living and working in China who have first hand information, and not some politician running for office or antii-China zealot. Whether we agree with Chinese politics or their culture we need to see what they are doing in all aspects of their lives since economically they were our largest trading partner before the Trade War kicked in - just as it does ever election year.
data.description_html: A guild to get real news about China without political bashing nor propaganda. Our sources will be expats living and working in China who have first hand information, and not some politician running for office or antii-China zealot. Whether we agree with Chinese politics or their culture we need to see what they are doing in all aspects of their lives since economically they were our largest trading partner before the Trade War kicked in - just as it does ever election year.
data.name: ChinaNews

data.description:
Cartoons with a little *twist* 


𝗥𝗨𝗟𝗘𝗦

● Western cartoon, movie, comic, brand, or video game (Exception for Nintendo characters) characters only. 

● Female characters only.

● No Anime/Hentai/Furry.

● Images and GIFs only.

● No loli/shotacon characters.

● Include source of the image/GIF and name of character/show. Make sure to credit the artist if applicable. 

● No reposts (No reposting of any image/GIF that has been posted recent).

● No low quality images/GIFs (Images/GIFs should not be blurry/potato quality. Screenshots also count as low quality).

● Images and GIFs must be direct links.

● No text posts.

● Keep it civil and on topic.

● Follow all Ruqqus rules.


𝗙𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗗𝗦 𝗢𝗙 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗚𝗨𝗜𝗟𝗗

+PAWG

+WrestleWithThePlot

+Bimbos

+stripgirls

+Upskirt

Guild icon by Shadbase.
Art In the guild banner by Phillip-the-2.
